Author: MidwestSkinnyCow
Text: Sometimes antibiotics make my stomach hurt if I don't take them with food. But if I eat 1 slice of toast when I take them, it usually fixes the problem.

Author: swagzilla_xo
Text: I had strep twice this year and didn’t take my antibiotics with food (maybe some of them but not for the purpose of taking food with them).  I felt okay and my doctor only told to take probiotics with it, but it might depend which antibiotics you’re on and what your doctor says
